sentences.en: A guerrilla war has lingered into its fourth decade.
sentences.cn: 一场游击战已经持续了30多年。

sentences.en: Felipe Gonzalez won a fourth term of office in Spain's election.
sentences.cn: 费利佩·冈萨雷斯在西班牙选举中获得第4次连任。

sentences.en: He refers to the US fourth and fifth amendments on these topics.
sentences.cn: 他指的是美国第四和第五修正案的有关权利。

sentences.en: her fourth birthday
sentences.cn: 她的四岁生日

sentences.en: I had to lug my bags up to the fourth floor.
sentences.cn: 我只得费劲地把我的几个包拖上五楼。

sentences.en: In his fourth year he was truanting regularly.
sentences.cn: 上四年级时，他频频旷课。

sentences.en: in the fourth century
sentences.cn: 在四世纪

sentences.en: Many boys explode firecrackers on the Fourth of July.
sentences.cn: 许多男孩子在7月4日那天放爆竹.

sentences.en: one-fourth/three-fourths
She had been sitting with her knitting at her fourth-floor window.
sentences.cn: 她那时正坐在5楼的窗前织东西。

sentences.en: She has recently published her fourth book with the Commercial Press.
sentences.cn: 她最近在商务印书馆出版了她的第4本专著.

sentences.en: She jumped the fourth grade in primary school.
sentences.cn: 她跳过了小学四年级.

sentences.en: She tolerated the teasing, until the fourth grade.
sentences.cn: 她忍受着别人的嘲笑，一直忍到四年级。

sentences.en: Steffi Graf claimed a fourth Wimbledon title in 1992.
sentences.cn: 施特菲·格拉芙于1992年第4次赢得温布尔登桂冠。

sentences.en: The brooch dates back to the fourth century BC.
sentences.cn: 这枚胸针的历史可以追溯到公元前4世纪。

sentences.en: The car was in fourth gear.
sentences.cn: 车挂的是四挡。

sentences.en: the fourth of July
sentences.cn: 7月4日

sentences.en: The Fourth of July domestic culinary pyromania is followed by community pyrotechnics.
sentences.cn: 七月四日,人们在家里食完人间烟火,接下去就是社区的烟花会.

sentences.en: The lift bell pinged at the fourth floor.
sentences.cn: 电梯铃在第五层响了。

sentences.en: Then, we plot the different graphs so that they each take up one fourth of the screen.
sentences.cn: 然后，我们绘制不同的曲线图，从而它们可以每个图占据屏幕的四分之一。

sentences.en: There was to be a fourth thing, but as yet he knew nothing of it.
sentences.cn: 只定还会有第四件扰乱着他心绪的事情，但时至今日他还不得而知。

sentences.en: They took the lift to the fourth floor.
sentences.cn: 他们坐电梯到了四楼。

sentences.en: Who is that fourth one?
sentences.cn: 那第四个人是谁？

words.tran_cn: 第十四；月的第十四日；十四分之一
第四的，第四个的；四分之一的
第四，月的第四日；四分之一

phrases.tran_cn: 第四等级（新闻界的别称）
第四国际（1939年由托洛斯基为首的激进社会主义者小集团组成的反苏联盟）
第四脑室；第四脑室外侧孔；第四脑室正中孔

trans.tran_cn: 第四的，第四个的；四分之一的
trans.tran_en: coming after three other things in a series

trans.tran_cn: 第四，月的第四日，四分之一，第四音级
trans.tran_en: ¼; one of four equal parts
¼; one of four equal parts
coming after three other things in a series
the fourth thing in a series
